snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday’s selections include a woman’s bad experience with a Lyft driver, and an app that tries to teach foreign language with cat photos.
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday’s selections include a woman’s bad experience with a Lyft driver, and an app that tries to teach foreign language with cat photos.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Dark Side of a Taxi App, and Language Cats
